name: Sacrificial Dagger
description:
My first game ever made. 

It was for the Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice.

I practiced a lot with this game, and wanted to put a loto of things more, but i didn't have the time. 

I tried to use the limitation as a font to gain power. Every time you die, you gain more recources to beat the game

Thanks for playing

WASD - Move

Q  - open the list of sacrifices, after getting the dagger

right button mouse - use the sacrificial dagger
